teacher_dashboard.welcome_subtitle: Dhammaystir dejintaada si aad u bilowdo waxbarista iyo kasbashada.
teacher_dashboard.faq_title: Su\'aalaha Inta Badan La Is Weydiiyo
teacher_dashboard.faq_q1: Mudo intee le\'eg ayay qaadataa xaqiijinta?
teacher_dashboard.faq_a1: Xaqiijinta caadiyan waxay qaadataa 1-3 maalmood oo shaqo marka dhammaan dukumentiyada loo baahan yahay la soo gudbiyo.
teacher_dashboard.faq_q2: Goorma ayaa la i siiyaa lacagta?
teacher_dashboard.faq_a2: Lacagaha waxaa la bixiyaa bil kasta lacagtii bishii hore, caadiyan ka hor 15ka.
teacher_dashboard.faq_a3: Haa, waxaad soo gelin kartaa dukumentiyo cusub wakhti kasta oo aad rabto tabka Xaqiijinta haddii macluumaadkaagu isbedelo.

teacher_profile.verification_docs.checklist_description: Si loo hubiyo tayada iyo amniga madalkayaga, waxaan u baahanahay dhammaan macallimiinta inay xaqiijiyaan aqoonsigooda iyo shahaadooyinkooda. Fadlan dib u eeg shuruudaha sharciga ah. Marka dhammaan dukumentiyada la soo gudbiyo, kooxdayada ayaa dib u eegis ku samayn doonta si loo hubiyo in astaantaada si buuxda loo xaqiijiyay. Waxaad halkan ku soo gelin kartaa dukumentiyo kala duwan si aad u caddayso aqoonsigaaga iyo shahaadooyinkaaga macallinimo ee madalkayaga. Dukumentiyada loo baahan yahay waa khasab si loo helo galitaan buuxa oo madal ah, halka dukumentiyada ikhtiyaariga ah ay hagaajin karaan astaantaada. Fadlan hubi in dhammaan dukumentiyada ay yihiin kuwo cad, ansax ah, oo muujinaya macluumaadka la codsaday. Dukumentiyada aan la akhrin karin ama aan dhammaystirnayn waa la diidi doonaa waxayna dib u dhigi karaan habkaaga xaqiijinta. Wixii su\'aalo ah, tixraac qaybta caawinta ee dhinaca midigta.
teacher_profile.verification_docs.required_docs_subtitle: Dukumentiyadan waa qasab si loo helo galitaan buuxa oo madal ah.
teacher_profile.verification_docs.national_id_description: Aqoonsi sawir leh oo ay dowladda bixisay oo ansax ah.
teacher_profile.verification_docs.tax_photo_description: Dukumentigaaga aqoonsiga canshuurta ee rasmiga ah.
teacher_profile.verification_docs.proof_of_address_description: Biilka adeega ee dhawaan ama bayaanka bangiga (oo la soo saaray 3 bilood ee ugu dambeysay).
teacher_profile.verification_docs.optional_docs_subtitle: Ku hagaaji astaantaada iyo kalsoonidaada dukumentiyo dheeraad ah.
teacher_profile.verification_docs.academic_transcript_description: Diiwaankaaga akadeemiyadeed ee machad la aqoonsan yahay.
teacher_profile.verification_docs.tracking_history_description: Eeg gudbinta dukumentigaaga iyo taariikhda xaqiijinta.

teacher_profile.payout_setup.subtitle: Deji habkaaga lacag bixinta ee aad doorbidayso si aad lacagaha u hesho si hufan gobolkaaga.
teacher_profile.payout_setup.mobile_money_description: Si toos ah ugu hel lacagta akoonkaaga lacagta mobilka.
teacher_profile.payout_setup.bank_transfer_description: Si toos ah ugu shubi bangigaaga deegaanka.
teacher_profile.payout_setup.tax_agree_label: Waxaan xaqiijinayaa in macluumaadka la bixiyay uu sax yahay waxaana ogolahay Shuruudaha & Xaaladaha Canshuurta.
teacher_profile.payout_setup.transactional_terms_description: Lacagaha waxaa la bixiyaa bil kasta. Waxaa loo baahan yahay ugu yaraan $50. Wakhtiyada farsamaynta caadiga ah waxay ku xiran tahay habkaaga la doortay.
teacher_profile.payout_setup.next_steps_description: Marka aad dejiso faahfaahinta lacag bixintaada, fadlan hubi in dukumentiyadaada canshuurta ay yihiin kuwo cusboonaysiiyay.

courses.title: Koorsooyin
courses.last_updated: Markii ugu dambeysay ee la cusboonaysiiyay

video_recorder.title: Duqista Fiidiyowga
video_recorder.camera_access_required: Helitaanka Kamarada Ayaa Loo Baahan Yahay
video_recorder.camera_access_instructions: Guji "Bilow Duqista" si aad u bilowdo casharkaaga fiidiyowga. Hubi inaad heysato iftiin iyo cod tayo leh.
video_recorder.select_course_lesson_title: Fadlan dooro koorso oo gali ciwaanka casharka
video_recorder.video_lesson_description: Cashar fiidiyow ah oo laga duubay browserka
video_recorder.upload_failed: Soo dejinta fiidiyowga ma guulaysan. Fadlan mar kale isku day.

ai_labeling.title: AI Faith Alignment
ai_labeling.subtitle: Review and label content to improve the AI's understanding of Orthodox theology.
ai_labeling.empty_body: There are no items requiring labeling in this category at the moment. Great job!
